titles.title: Military Commissions Guilty Plea Adjustment Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to clarify the right of an accused to plead guilty in a trial by a military commission for a capital offense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/13/2011--Introduced. Military Commissions Guilty Plea Adjustment Act - Permits a guilty plea made by the accused prior to the announcement of the sentence in a capital offense trial before a military commission to form the basis of an agreement to reduce the maximum approved sentence.
